urls.description: Join the fight against global warming with our Sharia-compliant platform that tokenizes forest assets, allowing individuals and businesses to invest in sustainable forestry while adhering to Islamic finance principles. Our network creates a transparent and community-driven model that promotes conservation and climate action. Investors can earn ethical returns while actively participating in the preservation of our planet's vital resources. By tokenizing land parcels, timber reserves, carbon credits, and other ecosystem services, we aim to bridge the gap between innovative technology and environmental responsibility, fostering a halal-certified green economy for future generations.

urls.description: What is the IECL Forum ? The Forum aims to propose a forward-thinking analysis of international law and regulations to advance a fairer and more sustainable transition.
